articles.summary: Ukraine attacks Russian air bases in far-reaching drone strikes Drones smuggled into Russia hit bases as far away as Siberia and the far east, destroying 41 aircraft that carry cruise missiles and detect enemy planes, said a Ukrainian official. articles.summary: Conservative historian wins Polish presidential vote Karol Nawrocki is Poland's next president With all votes counted, right-wing historian Karol Nawrocki has been elected Poland's new president, the state electoral commission (PKW) said.
